website_summaries.verdict: This argan pure oil is possibly less potent, which may appeal to those who prefer a lighter scent and texture. However, be aware of known issues with either outdated or rancid product.
pros: Some users brag about how soft this oil makes their hair feel, and how effective it is as a moisturizer
Free of harsh and artificial ingredients
cons: Some quality concerns, as some users received bottles that smelled rancid or contained cloudy oil

customer_reviews.title: Freaking love this!!
customer_reviews.text: It's so light and non greasy! I scrunch it into damp hair and it curls up my hair without looking crunchy or feeling hard. It has no odor either. I wish I had discovered this sooner! Definitely can not substitute with coconut oil or aloe gel and water! I was using that and the results from Argan oil are far superior!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Grasso

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at great prices.
customer_reviews.text: I trust this supplier for my essential oils. I have never been disappointed. Always high quality at great prices.
customer_reviews.author: RmD

customer_reviews.title: Large bottle at a great price. I previously purchased Josie Maran Argan oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Large bottle at a great price. I previously purchased Josie Maran Argan oil at an INSANE price. This works just as good at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality Moroccan Argan Oil and a very reasonable price! I have purchases much more expensive brands and this is every bit as pure and effective as those.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: ... Argon oils and this one is by far the best. It sinks into my skin and leaves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a few higher priced Argon oils and this one is by far the best. It sinks into my skin and leaves it extremely moisturized. Also is fantastic for my hair. Very impressed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Bill Day

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. I noticed I had some fine lines ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I noticed I had some fine lines in my neck, but after a year of using this oil, they completely disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to lotion on legs
customer_reviews.text: I used this as an alternative to lotion after shaving - my legs were always so dry, itchy and bumpy from irritation. This completely solved my issue, and you can use the oil on anything from cuticles to hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came and I started using it so I haven't seen any results yet
customer_reviews.author: TERRA

customer_reviews.title: I love the Argan oil from Majestic Pure
customer_reviews.text: I love the Argan oil from Majestic Pure. I have really sensitive, dry. flaky, and eczema skin. It works to hydrate my face. It has a nice consistency. A little goes a long way for the face about 3 drops is good to cover my whole face, I'll add a bit more if there are really dry areas. I use this mixed with some grapefruit oil (also purchased from Majestic Pure) for days when I have acne. Give this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Went rancid after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Argan oil is the only thing that eliminates frizz by properly hydrating my 3c curly hair. My curls are defined & silky with no frizz. HOWEVER this product arrived and on November 17, and was rancid with a very unpleasant sour smell. When I got it, the smell was normal for Argan oil. It’s a slightly nutty smell. My husband says it makes my hair smell like brownies. Its been just over 2 weeks and the smell is somewhat like sour milk. This hasnt happened to me with other brands of Argan oil. It’s gross and unacceptable after just 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Xander and Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Its good stuff. Not much scent but pleasant. Also not really a need to use soap if i use it in the bath. Seems like it works like soap but 1000x better for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: jY

customer_reviews.title: Malodorous, acrid-smelling—Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying oils from Majestic Pure for a few years. Unfortunately this product missed the mark. The oil arrived smelling of manure, but more acrid. True argan oil has a mild, nutty aroma. It is pleasant and not an impediment to cosmetic use. The bottle that I received is unusable due to its odor. Perhaps it was a bad batch? I can not recommend the product based on the bottle that I received.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my face, but now I use it in my hair. I found it to be a bit too heavy and oily under my makeup, no matter how little I used. And my skin still felt dry and tight. It didn’t break my skin out though, so that was nice. I ended up adding a few drops to my hair before blow drying, and it smoothed my split ends so well! I was very impressed, so that’s now its primary use. Be careful to not use everyday though, as it will build up. I found that it takes about two separate washes to remove, so I only use it every other, or every third, wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: makatrod

customer_reviews.title: ... products and I think this is one of the best ones out there
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of Argan oil products and I think this is one of the best ones out there. I use it all the time for my hair, as a leave-in conditioner or a pre-shower mask, makes my hair feel great, fresh, and look naturally healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Lina FaridTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Prompt, well-packaged delivery. Product in sealed and dark container. Best oil for dry face skin. Absorbs quickly. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Feels on hair, but hate the smell
customer_reviews.text: I generally love the smell or argan, or so I thought. This product doesn't smell like any other argan products that I've smelled before. It's not the worst smell in the world, but it's not very pleasant. I should've probably just returned it, but I never got around to it, so now I'm stuck with it. At least I do think it nourishes my hair and keeps it healthy. Also, a little goes a long way so it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: it didn't do anything for me
customer_reviews.text: i out of the blue started having extremely dry skin i woild put Argan oil twice a day and it did nothing! It smells nutty which i didnt like the smell but i didn't mind it aslong as it worked however, it didn't! I also put it in my hair and it would make it so oily even with the smallest amount but it didn't even make it shinier or healthier looking. Overall I would not buy it. BTW this Argan oil is similar to Josie maran Argam oil that cost wayyyy more. It's a good duplicate and does the same.... nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Roger.M

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this a try because it states it is organic and "pure"... Not so much. Not like any other Argan Oil I have ever used. What a waste of money. I left it in my drawer and forgot about it today after using it twice. Tossed it, today. I'm so curious how all of these oils that are on the cheaper side yet somehow Organic and "Pure" are getting so many stars...
customer_reviews.author: Anjel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t compare with salon brand
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t even come close to comparing with the salon brand Moroccan Oil. I even put it in the old bottle. It’s much thinner. You need to use way more of it and it leaves your hair looking greasy. Don’t try to make this work. Just buy the name brand. Only thing I will say is I’ll use this for my daughter as it’s “clean” and the name brand is quite “dirty” with some questionable ingredients in it.
customer_reviews.author: JShutterbugF

customer_reviews.title: I love what argan oil does for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I love what argan oil does for my skin, and wanted to find something that wasn't as pricey as Body Shop's argan oil. However, this stuff was terrible - it did not smell like argan oil should, smelled sour-ish, and resulted in really bad breakouts. I had to stop using this and then go on a three-month intensive care regimen to fix my skin. Will not recommend :/
customer_reviews.author: Pranav

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin and hair
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my face before applying moisturizer and on my hair before blow-drying.
customer_reviews.author: Prethi D. John

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne, nails, hair shine, psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a LOT of argan oil and this is one of my favorites. It’s really hard to find good quality oil. I use it for acne, my nail cuticles, and in my hair. Love the healthy shine it adds. Best to work just a tiny bit to damp hair. I wash my face twice a day and put on argan after and no acne breakouts. It also greatly reduces my psoriasis! It’s almost non existent on my arms/elbows after putting it on daily. You see results in a couple days. Works great! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Keith McCoy & Shannon Esbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Great for face hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great for face hair and nails. Leave my skin looking better than regular moisturisers. It does not leave my skin oily.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the rating.
customer_reviews.text: I was browsing for a replacement for the more expensive Moroccanoil, which is my favorite and came across the Argan Oil and purchased it because of the high number of reviews and the 4.5 star review. I found that it leaves a tacky feel upon application and by the end of the day it makes my hair feel oily. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Simply Olive Oil, Buy somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: This isn't Argan oil. This is probably 5-10% argan oil and 90-95% olive oil. Can't fool a middle eastern. Really disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.author: Moamen Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the argan oil itself comes in a heavy brown glass bottle seem to be of good quality. It came with a glass dropper that was broken it was wrapped in bubble wrap-but I'm not gonna totally blame the company Amazon and the person that drops it off may just have been rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eucharist

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in September and am so upset with myself for not realizing before purchasing that this is not 100% Argan oil, this is cut with Kernal oil.
customer_reviews.author: sivad1874

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my face, hair, and nails! I was nervous about putting an oil on my face at first, and did a lot of product comparing and researching. This really impressed me, and it moisturizes my face well, and I don’t have to use very much of it. Sometimes I mix a drop or two with another moisturizer, and it feels really nice and fresh. For my hair, if really adds a shine, and I like to put a little on my ends before bed. When I put it on my nails, they feel very hydrated, and look shiny
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair feel soft and give it a shine I haven't seen for a long while. I have naturally curly hair that has been more frizzy than curly until I started using the Moroccan Argan Oil, now it has bounce and body again. I have also used it on my face and neck and it hydrates my skin. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: GerryA

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: This oil is supposed to have a light nutty smell. The bottle I got smelled like manure, and it wasn’t “light” by any means. I used it to make beard oil. Once the scent from the essentials I used wore off, all that was left was a foul stench. Another crappy product for the toilet 😡
customer_reviews.author: SingleDad

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It is so light, great for face and hair. It does not weigh down hair and it moisturizes nicely. I tried it on my face and realized that it can be used a daytime moisturizer. This is the first time I am using pure Argan oil and I am already hooked. The pdf document with the benefits of Argan Oil is a nice extra. Thanks Majestic Pure. - Donna
customer_reviews.author: Satosh

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I color my hair every couple of months and it always seems to get very dry on the ends. This time after I colored my hair while it was still wet I took about a quarter size drop of this oil and rubbed on the ends of my hair before brushing it out. Not only was my hair healthier on the he ends but, all of my hair feels smooth and soft. I can’t believe the difference. I use it every day now instead of detangler and I love how my hair feels.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Argan Oil for Lustrous Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this particular brand, but I can tell you I will definitely be ordering more when I run out this Argan Oil makes my hair looks so full and enhances my curly locks and adds a nice little luster to my hair. I mix it into shampoos and conditioners - I even mix it into my face cream! I love this product!-
customer_reviews.author: zengirl

customer_reviews.title: Really Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this company for their essential oils, and this is the first time I have tried one of their hair/face oils, and it is lovely. I had been using an Argan Oil that had silicones in it and my hair does NOT like silicone in any way. So, I was looking for a good pure Argan oil at a reasonable cost, and Majestic Pure delivered, in every way. I have bought a lot of different essentials from Majestic Pure, and now a beauty oil, and I am a very happy customer - Majestic Pure has never let me down, I wish I could give them ten stars, lol. I am a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: it just has a very foul stench that I can't say smells nutty
customer_reviews.text: I definitely don't think I could ever get used to the smell of this one, it just has a very foul stench that I can't say smells nutty...more like the musk of a forest or something. Yuck. Despite of it, I have to give this a five stars rating because this oil is shrinking my pores and perfecting my skin to another level. Seriously, so glad to have found a quality oil for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and no more frizz
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I use this to tame the frizz in my hair. I was once told by a stylist that everyone's scalp is too dry and all could use some additional oil and recommended a few brands. I have tried a few other argon oils from lots of other places in the world but this one seems to be the right kind for my hair. My scalp no longer gets a little itchy by the second day without a wash like it usually does. That's when I know it's time to wash my hair. I actually went 3 days because I lost track because my hair was looking FABULOUS.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel RocksTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: This Majestic Pure Argan Oil is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Argan oil to use with aloe vera for a leave in hair conditioner and it is working very well. It makes my hair look soft and healthy. I use about 3 drops of Argan with 2 tablespoons of aloe Vera. My nails had been very dry lately so I rubbed some of the Argan on them and now they look and feel much better. In addition, my lips had become extremely dry and my moisturizer and lip balm weren’t helping. I applied some of the Argan oil to my lips and now they’re smooth and moist.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Goes on dry, keeps ur skin moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs right away, kinda weird for an oil. I like the light nutty fragrance (very very subtle I just have a super sensitive sense of smell). Makes my skin buttery soft! I apply a thin streak on each leg and then a pump or two of petroleum free lotion to make it go further.
customer_reviews.author: DyingStarLite

customer_reviews.title: Argan Oil Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Our family is a lover of Josie Maran Argan oil, so we had high expectations and were a bit skeptical prior to buying this. I can say if you are on the fence, BUY THIS!!! It has a slight smell, reminds me of tree bark (It's a mild scent) but performs just beautifully. It's a big bottle so I expect it will last a good long while. My daughter loves it and she is very particular about her argan oils. She mixes it with moisturizer and says she doesn't even notice the smell at all! I use it on the backs of my hands and cuticles and rub it in. Very good product and well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: ColoRN

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose oil!
customer_reviews.text: This is a large quantity of Argan oil that is pure and natural and not tested on animals. The instructions give you some nice applications suggestions that include using it on your hair, nails and skin! I have enjoyed using it on all three now and I like that despite it being an oil it is light enough that it does not feel too greasy and I have noticed an improvement in my hair when applying it to my hair damp as suggested. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the argon oil
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the argon oil . I am using it to help with fingernails that peel and break, and for moisture treatment to back of my hands. It is visibly making a difference for both.
customer_reviews.author: Smiling Big

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This oil is really nice. Makes my skin feel silky smooth and the smell is light an not obtrusive at all. Tried it for my hair and it does leave a shine but it really sticks to the strands and can look greasy. I can't say that its done anything magnificent for my hair but definitely has helped my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair silky and my skin drinks it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a skin moisturizer for my whole body including my sensitive face and love it. I don't think it clogs pores
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Shipment was fast. It is very well packaged -- arrived with secure packaging and I am very impressed. Fast shipment. I use it as a skin moisturizer for my whole body including my sensitive face and love it. I don't think it clogs pores; if anything, it seems to minimize them. Love the product. It has a faint nutty smell. The only thing I would love to know better is if this is an organic product as there is no certification anywhere on the label and I am looking for a true organic argan oil product. Other than that I would say it is not bad a product.
customer_reviews.author: CLEO-WW

customer_reviews.title: Miracle foundation!!!😊💕🎂
customer_reviews.text: I watched a youtube video on absolutely flawless skin by mixing a bit of your foundation with a drop of oil and I use this Argon oil for that purpose. My skin is oily, but it works!!! UNBELIEVABLE!!! At 62, and gorgeous, glowing complexion. I use to take off makeup, and mix 5 drops or so with moisturizer at night. You will wake up with flawless, glowing skin the first time you try it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Very pleased

customer_reviews.title: My hair loves this oil.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil to use on my hair and my hair loves it. I have very fine hair that tends to dry out easily when blow drying. After washing my hair, rinsing and towel drying, I put about 3 drops of the oil (I have long hair) on the palms of my hands, then rub together & rub my hands onto my hair before blow drying. My hair is so shiny & soft afterwards. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for hair but really love it to moisturize my face due to increasingly red Rosacea. Moisturizing and almost no scent is great way better than perfume and chemicals. It also cured my cracked skin on the edges of my fingers, working in a health care field and in water much of the time it gets very dry and cracked. Thanks for the recommendation Kyle (BS).
customer_reviews.author: Lacie Root

customer_reviews.title: Us sparingly, it goes a long way. It also relieves itching.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a year now & I love it. I originally ordered this to help stop my extreme itch under my breasts. I started using this daily on my face. I’m not going to say it’s an anti-aging product, but it’s helping. It’s easy to use & soaks into your skin almost right away. I massage a small amount of each area of my face & neck. No dryness or tight skin. Also it’s not oily. Absorbs very well. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great oil for nails and skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Argan oil for a couple of weeks now and I am really liking it. Being a so called dry oil it doesn't stay oily when you use it. Place some on your nails and they just soak it up. It doesn't leave your face or hands greasy/ oily. I haven't noticed any overnight change but I do feel that it has helped my brittle nails immensely. I recommend this oil and company. Great oil, nice smell. I believe this is a quality product. I really like the additional information they provide. Buy it if you want a high quality product which is very helpful for you.
customer_reviews.author: Daceese

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this one almost every part of my body. Mostly on my hair, lips and cuticles. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because it is only Moroccan Argan Oil, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it is only Moroccan Argan Oil, with no added ingredients. The brands sold at the store have fragrance and added color, etc. The bottle and glass dropper were well packaged. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: So far...It's been working!
customer_reviews.text: I received the 4 oz. bottle neatly and safely packed and in time, the first good impression. I am trying this product especially for my tangled hair and untamable growing new hair after abusing from my hair iron and desperate after trying everything. My first experience this week has been that I have seen improvement detangling and the short growing hair better and gently settled. have used it on my face, nails and dry areas of my body, and so far, I noticed improvement. Therefore I expect much improvement with continuous use of this product. I will grade again on my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cuevas Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Argan is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for various reasons. I like to use argan oil as a treatment for my hair. I also use it to help prevent razor burn and as a moisturizer. Recently my fiancé has started using it as a beard oil. This oil works for everything! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: I usually feel like I've used canola oil instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes for my hair and skin. It is just such a heavy oil. I usually feel like I've used canola oil instead. I still almost have my whole bottle and I doubt I will ever end up using it. I may just not have the hair or skin for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Dry mustache, beard, and eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a nutty scent, so that's the only thing I dislike so far. However, I put a tiny dab of this stuff on my dry mustache/beard areas last night. And this morning, I woke up with NO dry skin anywhere on my face. I also remember thinking how well it absorbed into my skin, leaving no oily spots or redness on my face either. I'm happy so far, but it's only been one night so I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Athan

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It has reduced the puffiness under my eyes and this was not what I purchased it for. I’ve also noticed that my skin is much softer under my eyes too. It has helped reduce crows feet. I also use it in my hair, on my hands and cuticles. It absorbs fast and doesn’t leave my skin or hair oily. It seems to reduce the oil on my face (I have naturally oily skin) as well. Mind you I only bought this for my hair. I love this stuff. I will definitely buy it again. Please look up the benefits of argan oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sighs...
customer_reviews.text: Third time ordering this... I love it for my skin and my hair, however, the past two bottles have had issues with the dropper. It only fills halfway and leaks. It doesn't sound like a big deal until you're actually using it and spilling oil everywhere. Bc this has happened twice, I've knocked off two stars. I still love the actual oil, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Defective dropper.
customer_reviews.text: The oil is amazing and silky. I use it as a moisturizer for my hair and it does an amazing job. I would give this 5 stars, however the dropper that came with this product was defective and would not seal properly. It kept “popping” off and I lost half of my product in my drawer one night when it decided to loosen off the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: it feels so much better. For so little product
customer_reviews.text: Using this oil as a few drops on the backs of my hands and rubbing into my cuticles after washing dishes or at night before bed has not only made them smoother and softer, but the skin practically says 'ahhh', it feels so much better. For so little product, the results are great. There's very little smell to it (which I love due to hayfever allergies, any strong scent is problematic), and the ingredients are so simple and organic. After a slight sunburn on my face (Strawberry Festival, yum!) I put a few a few drops between my palms and patted my face. Next day, no 'Strawberry' red face at all, everything back to normal. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Runethia

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only had good experiences with Majestic products
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the product very long but I’ve purchased other Majestic product. I’ve been wholly satisfied wuth anything I purchased from them. Majestic reached out to me to write this review. I was not offered anything in return. I don’t write reviews often but responded to their request given how l,eased I have been with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Bonz

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant scent and started a rash on test spot
customer_reviews.text: Received with no packaged box and no dropper, just bottle shrink wrapped. The scent is unpleasant, not like expected nutty scent. I tested on my inner arm for half a day, spot remains shinny and greasy, didn't absorb at all, and still smells. The worst is a small rash is developing. Received a bad batch?! Can't use, need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mag_prime

customer_reviews.title: Great for face!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I’d never bought this before as I use oils a lot in life. But I’ve been using this for my face for moisture and I love it. I actually use it in the morning before make up and it soaks in great. My makeup first dry up my face anymore and it also doesn’t look too shiny. No need to by these expensive oil drops for glow this works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: audreym

customer_reviews.title: Acne prone miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love this!!! I've been using it on my acne prone skin that's combo dry and oily and it is working miracles. Also been using it on my hair and it's so shiny and soft. I love this product so much. My skin is radiant, soft and clearing up. I haven't had a break out since I've started using this morning and night. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: make skin feel great and look good
customer_reviews.text: I read an article about the benefits of argan oil for your skin and decided to try it. I use it every morning on my face, I wash my face, apply the argan oil and then get in shower. Don't know if the steam from shower helps but my face but my face looks good and feels so smooth. I definitely recommend this as part of your daily routine. Also great for hands, really make them look and feel so smooth. Oh my way I am a senior citizens.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for flyaways, and split ends
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite happy with my purchase of this argan oil so far. It is not too oily, and has no unpleasant odor, and I use mine to smooth flyaway hairs and split ends. A little goes a long way. This product is great to use in natural body products, or blending as a carrier oil for essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlove

customer_reviews.title: Not what as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I heard so many rave reviews for Argan oil that I had too expectations when I received it. Obviously turns out it is not a magic portion. I especially got this for my hair. I did not notice anything good about it. I have thin, frizzy hair and did nothing to control it. I applied it in my face too but I got little rashes all over my face so I stopped using it after 2 days. Now i m just applying it on my nails because I have to make use of it for the money I paid. I am not sure if I chose the wrong brand but I am very displeased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fayza

customer_reviews.title: Becomes sticky
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to use this several times on my hair. I used a very small amount so it would blend and absorb, but not look oily. After a short time, the oil thickened and at first I thought I had accidentally gotten something sticky in my hair. It turned out to be the oil, so I had to stop using it. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HiggMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! Makes my hair manageable and shiny, no frizz!! 01/14/2017 - have been using Argan Oil now for a couple of weeks. It really does improve the condition of my hair. I finally read the PDF file that came in an email from the company and found out I can use it for acne, in a homemade toner and on all skin and scalp surfaces. I will be trying each recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely WONDERFUL product and incredibly versatile!
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought this for me for my birthday in February. I have been using it on my toenails ever since and as soon as the weather started getting cold I incorporated into my body lotion ( a couple of drops per palmful of lotion) and I absolutely LOVE this product. It lasts a long time and the quality is fantastic. I work at a dermatologist's office and I get chemical peels from time to time. This is a great product to put on my face as the skin starts to slough off. Keeps my skin very moisturized during this process as well. Cant say enough about it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kfly

customer_reviews.title: Im actually leaving a better star than I would want to
customer_reviews.text: Im actually leaving a better star than I would want to. I purchased this product because it had so many buyers. Ive bought different Argan oils in the past and this is my probably my least favorite. Yes, It comes in a dark bottle, but the actual oil is somewhat clear and not the consistency of real "pure" Argan oil. Argan oil should be thick and with a yellowish tinge.
customer_reviews.author: rgnagnarelli

customer_reviews.title: I love this. My sister told me about it
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My sister told me about it. I use it on my skin with a couple of other products. It feels clean. People mentioned it had a smell and I have sensitivity to odors but I can't detect an odor. I am sold on buying this product and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, beware of a leaky bottle tho
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this oil! It seems to be a very quality product, and doesn't have any strange smells. The bottle did leak during shipment tho, and as this is kinda an expensive oil,I did take away one star for that. I've included two pictures of how I received the oil so you can see the extent of the leak. If I had to guess, I'd say about half an ounce leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Dalek Caan

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting softness.
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil for my hands rather than use a hand cream because it stays on longer. I also use this oil for my hair and nails. And especially when I get out the shower to help seal in the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: marlea3

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I have neither dry nor oily skin. I purchased this once before based on reviews. After cleansing my face at night, while my skin is still moist, I massage several drops into my face and neck area. I also rub a couple of drops into my elbows. I would not be without this oil now. It keeps my skin plump, full and youthful. I have no wrinkles. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing and light!
customer_reviews.text: It's great. You only need a few drops so don't go overboard! Otherwise your hair will end up a greasy mess. I used a few drops on the ends of my hair when it was really long and it made my dry, split-ends really soft and smooth. A few drops on my hands in the dry winter months keeps my cuticles from cracking. There isn't much of a smell to it. Just a very faint, slightly nutty scent. Only if you stick your nose right in the bottle. The bottle itself comes with a dropper for easy dispensing.
customer_reviews.author: PeachyKeen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this argan oil and love the great price! The only issue (very small, but still a bit of an annoyance) is that the dropper has issues and tends to leak oil around the dropper bulb, leaving it to run down the bottle for a bit of a mess on the counter if you're not careful. Not a huge issue since the oil is so nice, just like the price. Will purchase again, just hoping the dropper issue was a one time deal. Don't be afraid to purchase this, it is well worth the price and leaves your skin super soft, smooth, and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Terelynn

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I used another brand before, but found it was costly and restrictive in use (only hair).I wanted something that would be good for my hair, yet not harmful to my skin. I am biracial and my hair needs a good oil that isnt heavy or greasy and provides a good yet not fake looking sheen. Doubled with my keratin treatments, my hair looks great and feels great too.
customer_reviews.author: Adae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of Argan oil. My first was from InstaNatural. I really liked the product from both companies. The packaging for Majestic Pure with the dropper system worked better for me as opposed to the pump system for InstaNatural. I have been applying this oil to my face daily this past winter. I love how well it moisturizes without feeling icky. I now mix a few drops of my serums with the oil before I apply. I am loving the effect. I will not be buying moisturizer lotions for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: High quality, hefty quantity, natural, and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love essential oils, and this one is 100% pure. Usually Argan oil has a very faint nutty smell, but this one does not smell at all. I love that this bottle is huge, so I can use it all over my body. I've been adding it to my body lotions, facial moisturizers and rubbing it into my circles. My face feels baby soft and it does not clog my pores like some oils do. Great for dry skin, especially after this brutal winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is colorless and had low scent, perfect to put on face fresh out of shower before sunscreen and makeup. I've used it for years and my skin has recovered from all flaky patches and has an even tone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: so good! I use it mixed with a little bit ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I use it mixed with a little bit of tea tree oil for my face, and I use some drops mixed directly in my hands with body lotion for my legs and arms, and also a little on the ends of my hair. Really great, multi-use beauty product. Be careful not to use too much! It absorbs better than jojoba and almond oil on my body and hair, but it can still make your hair oily if you use too much.
customer_reviews.author: fersakyn

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Aragon Oil
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite oil to use on my face! It's does not make feel like I have an oil slick on my face, it really has a unnoticeable sent, and it makes my skin look flawless! I love that it comes in a dark bottle with a dropper! I definitely will be ordering this again! I have it for awhile now and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: Love this Agan Oil
customer_reviews.text: Love the moisturizing quality of product. Works to make my hair shine, moisturizes hands, nails, knees, elbows and dry summer heels too. This is my fifth order from you, so that says a lot about your wonderful Argan oil. I enjoy the quality, price and fast shipping too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Value seems worth it. But no matter what, we notice oil mess. Unsure if it’s leaking around the bulb. Haven’t used it enough to rate it higher for efficacy bc it’s a pain to clean the bottle and protect the area it stays.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very pleased with this product. I’ve been using it for my radiation treatments and it have worked nicely on my skin. I was using the Josie Maran Argan oil the trial size. When I went to reorder the price had gone way up. The only slight negative I have is that the dropper could be better. It drops before you even squeeze the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for under-eye hydration!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Argan oil for over 6 months now for under my eyes for hydration. I have noticed such a change in my skin from doing so. A friend had purchased a similar product but I was disappointed it was not listed as organic. After researching other options I found this product here on Amazon and love that it's cruelty-free as well as organic! I have even used it in my hair a few times for extra dry days.
customer_reviews.author: J. David

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged, fast shipping, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot to say about a product like this, especially if there's no Cons to notify other customers about. It washes clean. Good for face and skin, as well as head hair. Non irritating.
customer_reviews.author: sci f.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought... Great for treated damaged hair and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: NikNak

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: This argon oil is quite good and helps smooth my hair and tame those horrible frizzies! A little is all you need too. I haven't used it on my face yet but argon oil is great for the skin and I plan to try it with my moisturizer soon. So far I'm very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this product would be wonderful for thick hair. I do not have that. It was very sticky and heavy. It took several washings to get it out of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry Lover

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for over a year and use it every day. I have dry skin and this argan oil keeps me nice and moisturized. I also use it on the the ends of my hair to keep it from drying out and splitting. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: myfiorella

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly kinky hair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil for my Natural (4a) hair. My hair has been dry and I don't know if it's due to my choice in leave in conditioner or the winter season or heck maybe both. I have added this to my regimen to help my leave in because darn it I payed for it, I'm using it until there's nothing left. This Argan oil is amazing!! All I did was spray some water on my hair in the am to remoisturize and then seal in said moisture with this oil and I could instantly feel the difference in softness. My hair loves this stuff! Doesn't seem artificial in the least bit.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Once I hit 30 my face seemed to not like my normal moisturizer. It wouldn't hold at all. This has helped my face shine and feel soft!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fried and dyed hair.
customer_reviews.text: For that past year or so I've been regularly bleaching and dying my hair. So naturally it's quite dry and rather brittle. I've been hearing a lot of hype about argan oil and decided to give it a shot. It's amazing. I love to rub some on just after touching up my dye jobs. Makes my hair super soft and silky. The remaining film on my hands quickly soaks in and leaves my palms feeling lovely too. Almost no odor too. Definitely a must have if you like to abuse your hair as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Im addicted!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil because Ive been getting into makeup. Great moisturizer and primer for full face. I apply it before using liquid foundation, and whether I use a brush or beauty blender it really helps making it look natural and not cakey. I use a drop on my lips before liquid matte lipstick, which can dry out and get clumpy without it. Such a versatile product seeing as I have also used it for the ends of my hair and my finger nails.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It soaks into my skin quickly making my skin feel soft and wonderful. Sagan oil is what I've found that does well on my waist length hair to make it soft and bring out the natural shine but not make it greasy or heavy. It's wonderful for your whole body which I use a coconut fractionated oil carrier with a dropper of Aragon oil in a 1oz bottle. Put Aragon oil in a roller bottle for your lips to prevent sun or wind burn.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Russell

customer_reviews.title: I love the whole line of Majestic essential oils.
customer_reviews.text: I love the large size bottles and the great price. Everything is a stated in the description. I have not had a complaint yet and have been buying this for years. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate 132

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading articles about the use of Argan oil for hair and skin. For skin use it was OK but I don't think it really made a difference. For use in hair, it was too heavy and made my hair look oily too quickly. I had previously used Moroccan Oil and would recommend this over the Argan oil although it is much pricier.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: You will be very disappointed by cheaper substitutes with additional additives as I was
customer_reviews.text: This oil is miraculous for natural 1b hair with the added bonus of nourishing face and body. I try to spare it for my hair though. This is 100% pure and natural. You will be very disappointed by cheaper substitutes with additional additives as I was. There are other brands but be sure they say 100% argan oil
customer_reviews.author: ljsst4

customer_reviews.title: Great multitasking product.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, extremely acne-prone skin and recently I completely pared down my beauty routine in an effort to keep as many irritants as possible away from my skin. I've been using 3-4 drops of oil on my face at night and in the morning under my makeup for several months now and it has been a more effective winter moisturizer than all of my previous lotions, and has not exacerbated my acne. Used under makeup it gives my skin a dewy sheen. I don't use it as much for my hair because I have extremely fine straight hair that looks greasy if I use too much product, but a few drops on damp hair does make it much softer.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Routskaia

product_meta.title: Majestic Pure Moroccan Argan Oil for Hair, Face, Nails, Beard & Cuticles - for Men and Women - Pure & Natural, 4 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: High quality, authentic cold pressed South Western Moroccan Oil, no additives
Smooth in texture, pale to golden yellow in color with mild nutty smell

SAFETY WARNING: For external use only; Rub a very small amount on the inside of your elbow area to test for any allergic reaction before use, discontinue use if irritation occurs; Avoid contact with eyes; If pregnant, consult with your health care provider before use; Keep out of the reach of children
Delivered in dark amber glass bottle with a glass dropper for ease-of-use
Great moisturizer and natural oil for skin, hair, cuticles, foot, lips and face

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
